name: Janitor Run II
description: Janitor Run II is a Mario Kart -like game where you race through an campus hallway. The twist is that the game has real-time weather reflection and lighting which effects on game-play. Watch your way through narrow corridors and try to pick all special items. I get stars based on how good your time was. The game requires an internet connection for full functionality (weather effects, analytics and multiplayer).
